top_problem_solved: 1. Universal Test Board for Alstom – Golden Award Winner We successfully designed and developed a Universal Test Board for Alstom, which earned the prestigious Golden Award for Process Improvement. This solution streamlined their testing process, enhanced quality checks, and significantly reduced testing time, showcasing our capability to deliver impactful engineering innovations. 2. Critical On-Site Support to Titagarh Rail Systems When Titagarh, a leading metro train manufacturer, faced critical delays in delivering their first train, our team stepped in as a strategic partner. We deployed a dedicated team—including myself—who worked on-site for 3 continuous months to complete and streamline the electrical cable harness activities. Our swift intervention played a crucial role in resolving their production bottlenecks and meeting delivery timelines.
my_favourite_bni_story: Breaking Barriers – My Journey with BNI As an introvert, I’ve always found it difficult to initiate conversations and connect with new people. My natural shyness often held me back, especially in professional networking situations. To overcome this, I made a bold decision to volunteer and join BNI. It wasn’t easy—stepping into that first meeting felt like walking into the unknown. But that’s when I met Mr. Harish, a fellow team member who greeted me with a warm smile. He didn’t just welcome me—he took the time to introduce me to others, understand my reluctance, and gently guided me through those initial awkward steps. His support helped me break through my hesitation and start engaging with people more confidently. Looking back, that experience not only helped me grow professionally—it helped me grow personally. I’m still on the journey, but I’ve taken the most important step: I’ve started.
